snippet: Gigi Jordan has called the death of her 8-year-old son a mercy killing, meant to keep him from his father, who she said was abusive.
abstract: Murder trial for multimillionaire pharmaceutical executive Gigi Jordan will begin in New York State Supreme Court in Manhattan; she does not dispute giving fatal dose of drugs to her 8-year-old son in 2010, who was autistic, but she says it was a mercy killing meant to keep him from his abusive biological father; her lawyers say they will pursue a defense of extreme emotional disturbance.
lead_paragraph: Gigi Jordan has called the death of her 8-year-old son a mercy killing, meant to keep him from his father, who she said was abusive.

headline.main: Trial to Begin for a Millionaire Who Calls Her Son’s Death ‘Altruistic Filicide’
headline.print_headline: Trial to Begin for a Millionaire Who Calls Her Son’s Death ‘Altruistic Filicide’
